All,

Considering using NEAT for model estimation from time series, I was 
=
wondering, wether NEAT employs methods to foster generalization of 
network=
s (ie. to make them robust) ? I'm thinking about external 
fitness criteria=
 which are computed on separate validation / test 
data sets (separate from=
 weight / topology optimization) which one 
uses generally on training neur=
al networks. To my knowledge separate 
data sets are not used in NEAT.

Wha=
t actually is the stopping criterion for the training process ? I 
would ex=
pect something like decreasing fitness on a validation set in 
order to pre=
vent overfitting.

Thanks, 
Achim
